item.description:
Well Mother nature surely decided to play the trick on us instead of the treat on this Halloween weekend......so here is the plan for the day:

The ride will be rescheduled to next weekend so don't pack the costumes away tonight! Some people may be dealing with snow today, it is unseasonably cold, windy and a lot of debris on the road.  So not conditions that make riding fun.

We will meet at Dunkin Donuts in Hanover IN COSTUME and carpool to the Red Robin for lunch.  It is more of a family restaurant so there should be lots of younguns there to scare! Then after lunch we will roam the mall in search of children and impressionable adults to haunt.  Maybe find a place there to "treat" ourselves!

The Patriots are playing today around 4:15  so anyone who wants to come to Cindy and Sue's after our haunted happenings is welcome to watch the game there.

Hope to see most of you for lunch!

Meeting time:  11 am

Meeting location:  Dunkin Donuts in Hanover

COME IN COSTUME IF YOU HAVE ONE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

group.name: New England Thunder / South Shore, MA

item.name: Haunted Lunch
